info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 21 at 2:32AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches below 7000 feet, with up to 22 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible, especially on non-maintained mountain roads. Backcountry recreation will be impacted by the heavy snow and cold conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock, please visit our webpage and select Local Programs, then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
